Container.Name: Immich Power Tools
Container.Overview: An unofficial Immich client to provide better tools to organize and manage your Immich account.
Container.Requires: Requires a separate Immich server and Postgres database.

Config.Name: Immich URL
Config.Description: The URL to the Immich Server

Config.Name: Immich API Key
Config.Description: The API for your Immich server

Config.Name: Database Host
Config.Description: The host for the Postgres database connection

Config.Name: Database Port
Config.Description: The port for the Postgres database connection

Config.Name: Database Username
Config.Description: The username for the Postgres database connection

Config.Name: Database Password
Config.Description: The password for the Postgres database connection

Config.Name: Database Name
Config.Description: The name of the Postgres database
